name: Fly-by Pizza Guy
description:
Welcome to Fly-by Pizza Guy! Delivery pizzas in the dystopian future, where all safety regulations are scrapped in the name of productivity.

This project was created by:
Vivien Shen, Mark McGregor, Brandon White, and Joshua Strutt

The game was created as a final project for IMD 2006, a Game Design course at Carleton University.

Source code and sources used can be found on our GitHub page
